# any-llm

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-llm/refs/heads/main/docs/index.md): any-llm is a Python library providing a single interface to different llm providers.
- [Api - Completion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-ai/any-llm/refs/heads/main/docs/api/completion.md)
